name: Untitled Non Violent Stealth Game
description:
This is a 2D stealth puzzle game where the player is trying to steal ancient antique eggs from a museum with a twist - the player can travel between the past and the present and experience what the museum was like in a previous time. Use this time travelling power in order to slip past the guards and escape with the priceless eggs.

Controls: 

Arrow keys: Move

Shift: Sprint

C: See past/present

C + X: Switch between past and present

R: Restart level

Gameplay video: 

Themes chosen:

  • Espionage
  • Of Two Worlds
  • Reality Break
